name: Datakatalyst Solutions Pvt. Ltd. / Skillstory
description: Datakatalyst Solutions Pvt Ltd is a tech enabled HR consultancy and services company with its very own recruitment process product – SKILLSTORY. We are working on a socio-commercial initiative to help the low end workforce in India to acquire skills training and generate mass scale employment. 'SKILLSTORY'
features: We help startup founders with building the Business Plan, Go-to-Market (GTM) strategy along with Industry and Competition analysis
Our expert analysts  prepare the pitch deck, financial model, valuations and information memorandum suiting investor thesis
We match curated startups as per the thesis and get the investors to interact with founders to evaluate the investment opportunity
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: StartupFunding, SIMPLIFIED.
ShortDescription: Datakatalyst Solutions Pvt Ltd is a tech enabled HR consultancy and services company with its very own recruitment process product – SKILLSTORY.
enhanced_description: Datakatalyst Solutions Pvt. Ltd. operates as a tech-enabled HR consultancy and services company. Their proprietary recruitment process product, SKILLSTORY, is designed to enhance hiring and recruiting efficiency. Additionally, SKILLSTORY drives a socio-commercial initiative focused on providing skills training and generating mass employment for the low-end workforce in India. This dual focus positions them as providers of recruiting solutions, staffing services, HR consulting, and learning and development, including capabilities as a Learning Experience System (LXP).
key_use_cases: Providing HR consultation and strategic advice
Delivering skills training programs for workforce development
Facilitating mass employment generation, particularly for the low-end workforce in India
Utilizing a Learning Experience System (LXP) for learning and development initiatives
competitive_advantages: Tech-enabled approach to HR consultancy and services
Unique socio-commercial initiative for low-end workforce skills training and mass employment generation in India
roi_benefits: Access to a skilled workforce, particularly from the low-end workforce segment in India
primary_users: Workforce seeking skills training and employment
